page.title: 17Population
page.content: There are not many people living in our area.There are three farms, two small holdings two private dwellings and a large manor house. In the whole of the area there are only twenty eight people.Most of the people live in the area because they work on the land or are connected with the land. Out of these people there are only two children who are of school age and two children who are younger than school age. All the rest of the population are older and most of them have lived in the area for a very long time. At the three farms the families have been there a long time and can remember their grandfathers living there before them.Only one family has moved here from another area of the country.
